title: Social Engagement Recommendations – Personalized Reminders for Upcoming Social Activities
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want personalized reminders for upcoming social activities so that I can maintain my social connections without feeling monitored.

title: Simplified Video Calling Features for Connecting with Loved Ones
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want a simple video calling feature so that I can easily connect with my family without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Interest-based Activity Group Connections
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to receive recommendations for local activity groups or clubs based on my interests, so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities and continue participating in family activities without feeling monitored.

title: Memory Aid for Social Interactions – Reminders of Names and Relationships of Contacts
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to remind me of names and relationships of my contacts so that I can engage more comfortably and confidently in family activities and social interactions without feeling monitored.

title: Coordinated Messaging Threads for Family Updates
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want a simple and intuitive way to communicate with my family through coordinated messaging threads so that I can stay updated on family activities without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Personalized Emotional Support – Mood Tracking with Suggestions for Uplifting Activities
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to track my mood and suggest uplifting activities so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities and continue my active lifestyle without feeling monitored.

title: Local Resource Awareness – Directory of Nearby Senior-Friendly Venues and Services
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to easily find and access nearby senior-friendly venues and services so that I can engage in social activities and maintain connections with my family and community without feeling overwhelmed.
